verbs.description: If [ARG0: Trump] [V: believes] [ARG1: the North Korean nuclear threat is over] , and the rogue nuclear power is " no longer " a problem , his ignorance may actually be dangerous .
If Trump believes [ARG1: the North Korean nuclear threat] [V: is] [ARG2: over] , and the rogue nuclear power is " no longer " a problem , his ignorance may actually be dangerous .

If Trump believes the North Korean nuclear threat is over , and the rogue nuclear power is " no longer " a problem , his ignorance may actually be dangerous .

[ARGM-ADV: If Trump believes the North Korean nuclear threat is over , and the rogue nuclear power is " no longer " a problem] , [ARG1: his ignorance] [ARGM-MOD: may] [ARGM-ADV: actually] [V: be] [ARG2: dangerous] .
